title: Turn Any Web Page into Clean, Structured Data in Minutes — No CSS Selectors Required
subtitle: Stop wrestling with brittle scrapers. Our AI-powered Data-as-a-Service extracts the exact fields you want across changing layouts, so you can launch projects faster, cut maintenance to near-zero, and never miss critical market data again.

primaryCta.text: Start Free — Extract Your First Dataset Today

features.title: Tell it what you need. Get data, fast.
features.description: Type “product name,” “price,” or any field in plain English. Our AI understands page context and returns clean, structured JSON/CSV without manual selectors or XPath.

features.title: Resilient to layout changes
features.description: Traditional scrapers break when the DOM shifts. Our model adapts to new layouts and microcopy changes—dramatically reducing breakage and ongoing maintenance.

features.title: Browser-accurate at scale
features.description: Full browser automation handles dynamic sites, JavaScript rendering, and pagination. Run jobs in parallel and export to CSV, JSON, Sheets, or your data warehouse via API.

features.title: Built-in quality controls
features.description: Schema validation, deduplication, retries, and smart rate limiting keep your datasets clean and dependable—without extra engineering time.

features.title: Responsible and compliant by design
features.description: Respectful crawl settings, robots management, throttling, and audit logs help your team scrape responsibly and align with site policies.

features.title: Deploy in minutes, integrate anywhere
features.description: Hosted on battle-tested infrastructure with webhooks and integrations. Plug into your stack with ease—no servers to manage.

testimonials.quote: We went from days of selector tuning to shipping a production dataset in under an hour. The AI extraction is shockingly accurate.
testimonials.name: Ava R.

testimonials.quote: Layout changes used to break our pipelines every week. Now the model adapts and our maintenance tickets dropped by ~80%.
testimonials.name: Marcus L.

testimonials.quote: Non-technical teammates can describe the fields they want and get results right away. It’s made web data a team sport.
testimonials.name: Priya S.

faqs.question: How is this different from traditional scrapers?
faqs.answer: Traditional scrapers rely on brittle CSS/XPath selectors that break when page layouts change. Our AI understands page context and labels, so you simply describe the fields in natural language and it adapts across layouts—dramatically reducing setup and maintenance.

faqs.question: Will it work on any website?
faqs.answer: It’s designed for most public, browser-rendered websites. Results can vary based on site complexity and access controls. We provide rate limiting, retries, and responsible scraping controls to improve reliability while respecting site policies.

faqs.question: Do I need to code?
faqs.answer: No. Enter URLs, describe your fields, and click run. For teams that prefer automation, you can use our API, webhooks, and integrations to plug results into your workflows.

faqs.question: How do you handle anti-bot measures and CAPTCHAs?
faqs.answer: We use full browser automation and smart throttling to mimic human-like behavior. For protected pages or CAPTCHAs, we provide configuration options and best practices. Some sites may require additional permissions or may not be scrapeable.

faqs.question: What about accuracy and data quality?
faqs.answer: AI extraction is paired with schema validation, sampling, and deduplication to keep data clean. You can preview results, refine field descriptions, and iterate quickly to reach your target accuracy.

about: We built this platform to make web data accessible to everyone—not just engineers. Under the hood, it combines full browser automation with Google’s Gemini LLM to understand page context and extract the exact fields you describe in plain English. Instead of chasing brittle selectors, you get resilient, structured datasets you can trust. The service is deployed on proven cloud infrastructure and integrates with your existing tools via API, webhooks, and ready-made connectors. Whether you’re tracking competitor prices, enriching leads, or powering market intelligence, our goal is simple: help you ship accurate datasets in minutes, not weeks.

seo.seo_title: AI Web Scraping Data-as-a-Service | Clean Structured Data
seo.meta_description: AI web scraping and data extraction without CSS selectors. Our Data-as-a-Service delivers clean, structured data across changing layouts—fast, low maintenance.
seo.og_title: Turn Any Web Page into Clean, Structured Data—No CSS Selectors Required
seo.og_description: Stop wrestling with brittle scrapers. Our AI-powered DaaS extracts the exact fields you need across changing layouts—launch faster, slash maintenance, and never miss critical market data.

visual_mood.overall_feeling: Trusted, intelligent, and approachable—advanced AI power that feels safe and usable for everyone.
visual_mood.target_emotion: Confidence and empowerment to extract web data without friction.

design.typography_style: Headings: Space Grotesk (600–700) for a modern, technical feel without intimidation. Body/UI: Inter (400–600) for exceptional legibility at small sizes. Code: JetBrains Mono (400–500) for snippets and API examples. Base sizes: 16px body, 28–40px H1, 22–26px H2. Line-height 1.5–1.7 for paragraphs. Use 8pt spacing system. Ensure minimum 16px interactive targets and 4.5:1 contrast for text. Fallback stack: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif.
design.layout_approach: Hero: clear value prop (“AI‑Powered Web Data Extraction for Everyone”), supportive subhead (no‑code + API), Primary CTA (“Start free”) + Secondary CTA (“See live demo”). Add social proof logos and trust badges (SOC2/ISO pending, uptime). Conversion: repeat CTA in sticky header on scroll; benefit-focused sections; templates gallery (use cases: e‑commerce prices, research, news monitoring); side-by-side No‑Code vs API tabs; interactive playground/demo; integrations (Google Sheets, Zapier/Make, BigQuery, Snowflake); pricing with monthly/annual toggle, transparent limits; testimonials with role tags; compliance & ethics section (robots.txt, ToS respect). Structure: 12‑column grid, generous whitespace, 72–96px section padding, sticky top nav with clear IA (Product, Templates, Pricing, Docs, Login, Start free). Accessibility: keyboard navigable, visible 3px focus ring, skip‑to‑content, semantic landmarks, ARIA for tabs/modals, form labels and error messages with text + icon, reduced motion preference honored. Dark mode: auto + toggle; ensure color tokens meet contrast in both modes. Performance: lazy‑load media, optimized SVGs, code-splitting. Modern aesthetics: soft card shadows, 12–16px corner radius, subtle blue→teal gradient accents, minimal illustrations, tasteful micro‑interactions (<200ms).
design.imagery_style: Product-first: crisp UI screenshots on light background with subtle gradient accents. Abstract data visuals (nodes/flows, table overlays) to signal AI + automation without hacker clichés. Short looping UI demos for setup and extraction runs. Inclusive, role‑based lifestyle shots (marketers, researchers, SMB owners, developers) used sparingly. Iconography: simple line icons with duotone blue/teal. Illustrate compliance (robots.txt awareness) and integrations with recognizable logos. Avoid busy stock imagery; prioritize clarity and authenticity.
ui_elements: Primary button (accent green) with clear label; secondary button (outlined primary)
Sticky header with Start free CTA
Hero social-proof strip (client logos)
No‑Code/API tab switcher component
Template cards with tags (Use case, Source, Output)
Onboarding wizard (URL input → selection → schedule → export)
URL input with validation and helper text
Scheduling picker (CRON + presets)
Progress/queue status with live updates (ARIA live region)
Run logs viewer (filterable)
Results table with column controls, CSV/JSON/Sheets export
Code snippet block (copy, language tabs, dark theme)
Quota/usage meter and rate‑limit indicator
Pricing cards with monthly/annual toggle and feature comparison
Trust badges (security, uptime, privacy) and compliance notice
Testimonials carousel with role/company
Empty states with guidance and quick actions
Inline help tooltips and ? info modals
Toast notifications (success/error) with undo where possible
Command palette (⌘K) for power users
Global search with recent items
Breadcrumbs in app areas
Pagination with accessible controls (avoid infinite scroll for data tables)
Filter chips and saved views
Skeleton loaders and reduced motion alternative
Theme toggle (light/dark) and system preference sync
Cookie consent banner with essential/analytics choices
Keyboard focus styles and skip‑links
Legal links (AUP, robots.txt policy, DMCA, Terms, Privacy)

businessAnalysis.target_audience: Data teams and analysts at SMBs/enterprises; growth marketers and sales ops for lead gen; e-commerce/pricing teams; market research/consulting firms; SEO/agency teams; product managers; developers; journalists/academics; no-code/prosumer users
businessAnalysis.business_model: SaaS (B2B-first with prosumer B2C), tiered subscription + usage-based/API credits, freemium trials; optional managed/enterprise services
key_value_props: No-code, AI-driven extractor that turns any webpage into structured data from natural-language prompts
Self-healing scrapers that adapt to site changes and dynamic content (JS-heavy pages)
Scalable cloud crawling with built-in proxy rotation, headless browsers, and CAPTCHA handling
Fast time-to-value for non-technical users (“a scraper for anyone”) with templates and visual point-and-click selection
High data quality with schema inference, deduplication, validation, and monitoring/retries
Flexible outputs and integrations (API, webhooks, CSV/JSON/Parquet, Google Sheets, Zapier, data warehouses)
Compliance-first options (rate limiting, robots.txt handling, consent controls) and security (SLA, audit logs)
Cost-effective vs. building/maintaining custom scrapers in-house
competitive_advantages: Natural-language to extractor generation reduces setup time vs. rule-based tools
Self-healing/AI models that auto-update selectors when the site layout changes, lowering maintenance
End-to-end managed infrastructure (proxies, rendering, anti-bot) enabling higher success rates
Intuitive UI accessible to non-developers plus powerful API/SDKs for engineers
Prebuilt blueprints for common use cases (price monitoring, lead lists, SERP, product catalogs)
Enterprise readiness (SLA, SSO, role-based access, audit/compliance)
Global IP pool and geo-targeting for localized data collection
